item.title: Lionel Richie - Stuck on You - Key of G - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Stuck on You by Lionel Richie from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Bm7, C, D, Em, G, G7.

item.title: Plain White T's - 1234 - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song 1234 by Plain White T's from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, D, G, Gm.

item.title: Spandau Ballet - True - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song True by Spandau Ballet from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Am, Am7, Bm7, C, Cm7, D, Em, F, G.

item.title: Eric Clapton - Change The World - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Change The World by Eric Clapton from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, A6, A7, B, Bm7, Cm7, C♯m7, E, E7, Esus4, F♯m, Gm, G♯, G♯m.

item.title: Justin James - Perfect Sometimes - Key of D - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Perfect Sometimes by Justin James from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, D, Em, G.

item.title: Colbie Caillat - I Do - Key of A - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song I Do by Colbie Caillat from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Asus4, Bm, Bm7, C♯7, D, Dm7, E, F♯m.

item.title: The Office Theme Song (Ukulele Play-Along!) - Ukulele Underground
C&K - Life’s Different Now - Key of D - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Life’s Different Now by C&K from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Bm7, D, G, Gm.

item.title: Aldrine Guerrero - Ice Cream - Key of Bb - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Ice Cream by Aldrine Guerrero from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Bm7, B♭, Cm7, E♭, E♭m, F, Gm.

item.title: Simple Plan - Summer Paradise - Key of D - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Summer Paradise by Simple Plan from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, D, F♯, G.

item.title: Sammy J - Wishing On Your Love - Key of A - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Wishing On Your Love by Sammy J from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, C♯m7, E7.

item.title: Édith Piaf - La Vie En Rose - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song La Vie En Rose by Édith Piaf from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A7, Am, Bm7, B♭dim, C, Cm6, D7, D7♭5, D7♯5, G6, G7.

item.title: Kenny Loggins - Danny's Song - Key of D - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Danny's Song by Kenny Loggins from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, C, D, E7, F♯m, G.

item.title: Jimi Hendrix - Little Wing - Key of G - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Little Wing by Jimi Hendrix from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Am, Bm7, B♭m7, C, D, Em, F, F7, G.

item.title: Michael Bublé - Everything - Key of D - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Everything by Michael Bublé from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Am, B, Bm7, C♯m7, D, E, E7, F♯, G, Gm, G♯, G♯m.
